alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 11:48PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Cache and east central Box Elder Counties through 1215 AM MDT... At 1147 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brigham City, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Logan, Brigham City, Cache, Smithfield, Hyrum, Perry, Wellsville, Bear River City, Mantua, Corinne, Utah State University, Benson, Peter, North Logan, Providence, Nibley, Hyde Park, Millville, River Heights and Honeyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 361 and 377. US Route 89 between mile markers 459 and 465. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
